messages.message:
Hey Team,
I am trying to build Passport App from BUILD UI and seeing some inconsistency in the fields from refiner App.
Example of Full name from refiner extractions and Build UI extractions is given below along with the prompts used:
Build UI Prompt: Return full name of the person who holds this document
Refiner Prompt: string return the full name of the person for whom the passport is issued.
Here are the Build (https://aihub.preprod.instabase.com/hub/build/ba949147-7be8-489a-9e59-8aa977317fb0) and Refiner (http://om/apps/refiner-v5/edit/ib_app_admin/my-repo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/aihub/d87423fa-8f51-4c4c-b82f-f5b29d38e7fb/project/flows/modules/Passport.refiner/prog/model_refiner.ibrefiner?) links
CC: @Shubham @Shridhar Kawalkar

HI @Pavani Maragowni, can you add the refiner and Build link here?
Adding @hannah for the visibility.
just curious — have you tried a simpler build prompt? Something like “full name” should be enough. I think generally in Build your prompt should be shorter for extraction fields.
^in addition to this, how come you are using different prompts in refiner/build?
I tried that and for a different document it was picking up fathers name in the full name. That is the reason tried different prompt
Can you clarify what environment you are using for Refiner?
